channel.title: Mercury -
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/ixh69z.jpg[/img][/center]
[hr]
1.0 - Introduction Welcome to "Mercury". This is a project attempting to emulate the RuneScape 317 protocol. This is a server that was created by me. I created this server with hopes to improve my overall knowledge about the 317 protocol, and the Java language in general. We hope to achieve something that I have never done before. Create a stable, efficient, and easy-to-program base that allows for easy modification.
[hr]
2.0 - Section 2 We currently accept donations from PayPal ONLY. 50% of all donations will go towards the website, and other necessities. The other 50% will go to a charity that YOU, vote on. At the end of every month, I will take a picture of each donation given to charity. The charity chosen will be WSPA. I chose WSPA because I am an animal lover, and I can't stand to see animals in pain.
Donate -
PayPal email - Nicky_snowboardingmaster@hotmail.com Amount - Any amount you feel you can, 50% goes to the server, 50% goes to charity. Organization - WSPA.
[hr]
3.0 - The Application Layout
(To be able to join, you must have the following: Dropbox. , and Teamviewer.)
Here is the layout:
(Suggested Layout)
Code: [Select] In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want? (Core Programmer, Content Programmer, Client Programmer): How long have you used Java?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: //*****Other Info Below Here*****\\ [hr]
4.0 - Staff List
Core Programmers -
2/3
- XxxTilllYxxX - Sam Desroche, (Sweetmoma). (He is basically under my wing, hes not a 100% programmer. I am teaching him). - 'Sj_
Content Programmer -
1/2
- XxxTilllYxxX - 'Sj_ (Only willing to do some content work, other applicants will be pending still).
Client Programmer -
0/1
Person 1 [hr]
5.0 - Credits/Section 7
Contributor's name: s1gma. Contributor's name: blakeman8192. Contributor's name: Jacob Petra. Contributor's name: Lin Contributor's name: Thomas Nappo.
Without these people, I would NEVER be where I am. s1gma for his criticism, blakeman8192 for helping me with a few things, Jacob Petra for helping with packets, and login. Last but not least, Lin for him always putting up with me ;) and for helping with a few things. Thanks to Thomas for implementing a VERY VERY scaleable, powerful, and amazing engine.
[hr] Pictures - [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/x5cp4g.png[/img]
[img]http://i46.tinypic.com/2mzyw7l.png[/img]
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2r5vvdk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2rym07c.png[/img]
[code]Content - Logging - Packet System - NetWorking - XML Implementation - GUI - Started PlayerUpdating - Finished all masks. PlayerUpdating Half-Way done - Added Color console <3 thanks Canownueasy. - [/code] [hr]

item.title: Mercury -
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

xxxtilllyxxx:

I haven’t even started it yet… I have been grounded mostly. So I don’t know what you are talking about. I was almost finished, and then I decided to switch to a different system. Anyways, Sini be my guest bud :). Good luck getting ripped by t4 and s1gma again though! Hope you feel like a complete fucking retard.

I’m lecturing on your client knowledge; not your programming skill. Which still, both suck. Fucking threads and bits? I’m not that stupid; I just don’t have a skill level that they’d like to see for a person in my position. I don’t study enough rigorously and don’t care enough to be an elitist about it. I do know older and modern client protocol pretty well. I have made multiple 317, 508, 614, 634 and 666 bases. You have nothing going for you. You’re a nobody. Which is funny, because I have a java cup and you don’t. Continue on making excuses on how you can’t finish one simple protocol. It’s only uphill from here.
